pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Welcome to backtester!Backtester was born out of this project:[https://covidactnow.org/](https://covidactnow.org/)The goal of the project is to help backtest our forecasts to make sure they are as accurate as possible against historical time series.## Examples-- To Do --ToDos:* https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/AllenDowney/ProbablyOverthinkingIt/blob/master/sp500.ipynbOther libraries:* http://pmorissette.github.io/bt/* https://pypi.org/project/Backtesting/* https://qtpylib.io/docs/latest/index.html
